00679 
00684 void force_exchange_pseudodata(void)
00685 {
00686   int i, no;
00687   MPI_Status status;
00688   int level, sendTask, recvTask;
00689 
00690   for(i = DomainMyStart; i <= DomainMyLast; i++)
00691     {
00692       no = DomainNodeIndex[i];
00693 
00694       /* read out the multipole moments from the local base cells */
00695       DomainMoment[i].s[0] = Nodes[no].u.d.s[0];
00696       DomainMoment[i].s[1] = Nodes[no].u.d.s[1];
00697       DomainMoment[i].s[2] = Nodes[no].u.d.s[2];
00698       DomainMoment[i].vs[0] = Extnodes[no].vs[0];
00699       DomainMoment[i].vs[1] = Extnodes[no].vs[1];
00700       DomainMoment[i].vs[2] = Extnodes[no].vs[2];
00701       DomainMoment[i].mass = Nodes[no].u.d.mass;
00702 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
00703 #ifndef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
00704       DomainMoment[i].bitflags = Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags;
00705 #else
00706       DomainMoment[i].maxsoft = Nodes[no].maxsoft;
00707 #endif
00708 #endif
00709     }
00710 
00711   /* share the pseudo-particle data accross CPUs */
00712 
00713   for(level = 1; level < (1 << PTask); level++)
00714     {
00715       sendTask = ThisTask;
00716       recvTask = ThisTask ^ level;
00717 
00718       if(recvTask < NTask)
00719         MPI_Sendrecv(&DomainMoment[DomainStartList[sendTask]],
00720                      (DomainEndList[sendTask] - DomainStartList[sendTask] + 1) * sizeof(struct DomainNODE),
00721                      MPI_BYTE, recvTask, TAG_DMOM,
00722                      &DomainMoment[DomainStartList[recvTask]],
00723                      (DomainEndList[recvTask] - DomainStartList[recvTask] + 1) * sizeof(struct DomainNODE),
00724                      MPI_BYTE, recvTask, TAG_DMOM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00725     }
00726 
00727 }
00728 
00732 void force_treeupdate_pseudos(void)
00733 {
00734   int i, k, no;
00735   FLOAT sold[3], vsold[3], snew[3], vsnew[3], massold, massnew, mm;
00736 
00737 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
00738 #ifndef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
00739   int maxsofttype, diffsoftflag;
00740 #else
00741   FLOAT maxsoft;
00742 #endif
00743 #endif
00744 
00745   for(i = 0; i < NTopleaves; i++)
00746     if(i < DomainMyStart || i > DomainMyLast)
00747       {
00748         no = DomainNodeIndex[i];
00749 
00750         for(k = 0; k < 3; k++)
00751           {
00752             sold[k] = Nodes[no].u.d.s[k];
00753             vsold[k] = Extnodes[no].vs[k];
00754           }
00755         massold = Nodes[no].u.d.mass;
00756 
00757         for(k = 0; k < 3; k++)
00758           {
00759             snew[k] = DomainMoment[i].s[k];
00760             vsnew[k] = DomainMoment[i].vs[k];
00761           }
00762         massnew = DomainMoment[i].mass;
00763 
00764 
00765 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
00766 #ifndef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
00767         maxsofttype = (DomainMoment[i].bitflags >> 2) & 7;
00768         diffsoftflag = (DomainMoment[i].bitflags >> 5) & 1;
00769 #else
00770         maxsoft = DomainMoment[i].maxsoft;
00771 #endif
00772 #endif
00773         do
00774           {
00775             mm = Nodes[no].u.d.mass + massnew - massold;
00776             for(k = 0; k < 3; k++)
00777               {
00778                 if(mm > 0)
00779                   {
00780                     Nodes[no].u.d.s[k] =
00781                       (Nodes[no].u.d.mass * Nodes[no].u.d.s[k] + massnew * snew[k] - massold * sold[k]) / mm;
00782                     Extnodes[no].vs[k] =
00783                       (Nodes[no].u.d.mass * Extnodes[no].vs[k] + massnew * vsnew[k] -
00784                        massold * vsold[k]) / mm;
00785                   }
00786               }
00787             Nodes[no].u.d.mass = mm;
00788 
00789 
00790 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
00791 #ifndef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
00792             diffsoftflag |= (Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags >> 5) & 1;
00793 
00794             if(maxsofttype == 7)
00795               maxsofttype = (Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags >> 2) & 7;
00796             else
00797               {
00798                 if(((Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags >> 2) & 7) != 7)
00799                   {
00800                     if(All.ForceSoftening[((Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags >> 2) & 7)] >
00801                        All.ForceSoftening[maxsofttype])
00802                       {
00803                         maxsofttype = ((Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags >> 2) & 7);
00804                         diffsoftflag = 1;
00805                       }
00806                     else
00807                       {
00808                         if(All.ForceSoftening[((Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags >> 2) & 7)] <
00809                            All.ForceSoftening[maxsofttype])
00810                           diffsoftflag = 1;
00811                       }
00812                   }
00813               }
00814 
00815             Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags = (Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags & 3) + 4 * maxsofttype + 32 * diffsoftflag;
00816 #else
00817             if(Nodes[no].maxsoft < maxsoft)
00818               Nodes[no].maxsoft = maxsoft;
00819             maxsoft = Nodes[no].maxsoft;
00820 #endif
00821 #endif
00822             no = Nodes[no].u.d.father;
00823 
00824           }
00825         while(no >= 0);
00826       }
00827 }
00828 
00829 
00830 
00834 void force_flag_localnodes(void)
00835 {
00836   int no, i;
00837 
00838   /* mark all top-level nodes */
00839 
00840   for(i = 0; i < NTopleaves; i++)
00841     {
00842       no = DomainNodeIndex[i];
00843 
00844       while(no >= 0)
00845         {
00846           if((Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags & 1))
00847             break;
00848 
00849           Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags |= 1;
00850 
00851           no = Nodes[no].u.d.father;
00852         }
00853     }
00854 
00855   /* mark top-level nodes that contain local particles */
00856 
00857   for(i = DomainMyStart; i <= DomainMyLast; i++)
00858     {
00859       /*
00860          if(DomainMoment[i].mass > 0)
00861        */
00862       {
00863         no = DomainNodeIndex[i];
00864 
00865         while(no >= 0)
00866           {
00867             if((Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags & 2))
00868               break;
00869 
00870             Nodes[no].u.d.bitflags |= 2;
00871 
00872             no = Nodes[no].u.d.father;
00873           }
00874       }
00875     }
00876 }
00877 
00878 
00879 
00885 void force_update_len(void)
00886 {
00887   int i, no;
00888   MPI_Status status;
00889   int level, sendTask, recvTask;
00890 
00891   force_update_node_len_local();
00892 
00893   /* first update the side-lengths of all local nodes */
00894   for(i = DomainMyStart; i <= DomainMyLast; i++)
00895     {
00896       no = DomainNodeIndex[i];
00897 
00898       DomainTreeNodeLen[i] = Nodes[no].len;
00899     }
00900 
00901   for(level = 1; level < (1 << PTask); level++)
00902     {
00903       sendTask = ThisTask;
00904       recvTask = ThisTask ^ level;
00905 
00906       if(recvTask < NTask)
00907         MPI_Sendrecv(&DomainTreeNodeLen[DomainStartList[sendTask]],
00908                      (DomainEndList[sendTask] - DomainStartList[sendTask] + 1) * sizeof(FLOAT),
00909                      MPI_BYTE, recvTask, TAG_NODELEN,
00910                      &DomainTreeNodeLen[DomainStartList[recvTask]],
00911                      (DomainEndList[recvTask] - DomainStartList[recvTask] + 1) * sizeof(FLOAT),
00912                      MPI_BYTE, recvTask, TAG_NODELEN, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00913     }
00914 
00915   /* Finally, we update the top-level tree. */
00916   force_update_node_len_toptree();
00917 }
00918 
00919 
00923 void force_update_node_len_local(void)
00924 {
00925   int i, p, k, no;
00926   FLOAT dist, distmax;
00927 
00928   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
00929     {
00930       no = Father[i];
00931 
00932       for(k = 0, distmax = 0; k < 3; k++)
00933         {
00934           dist = P[i].Pos[k] - Nodes[no].center[k];
00935           if(dist < 0)
00936             dist = -dist;
00937           if(dist > distmax)
00938             distmax = dist;
00939         }
00940 
00941       if(distmax + distmax > Nodes[no].len)
00942         {
00943           Nodes[no].len = distmax + distmax;
00944           p = Nodes[no].u.d.father;
00945 
00946           while(p >= 0)
00947             {
00948               distmax = Nodes[p].center[0] - Nodes[no].center[0];
00949               if(distmax < 0)
00950                 distmax = -distmax;
00951               distmax = distmax + distmax + Nodes[no].len;
00952 
00953               if(0.999999 * distmax > Nodes[p].len)
00954                 {
00955                   Nodes[p].len = distmax;
00956                   no = p;
00957                   p = Nodes[p].u.d.father;
00958                 }
00959               else
00960                 break;
00961             }
00962         }
00963     }
00964 }
00965 
00966 
00970 void force_update_node_len_toptree(void)
00971 {
00972   int i, no, p;
00973   FLOAT distmax;
00974 
00975   for(i = 0; i < NTopleaves; i++)
00976     if(i < DomainMyStart || i > DomainMyLast)
00977       {
00978         no = DomainNodeIndex[i];
00979 
00980         if(Nodes[no].len < DomainTreeNodeLen[i])
00981           Nodes[no].len = DomainTreeNodeLen[i];
00982 
00983         p = Nodes[no].u.d.father;
00984 
00985         while(p >= 0)
00986           {
00987             distmax = Nodes[p].center[0] - Nodes[no].center[0];
00988             if(distmax < 0)
00989               distmax = -distmax;
00990             distmax = distmax + distmax + Nodes[no].len;
00991 
00992             if(0.999999 * distmax > Nodes[p].len)
00993               {
00994                 Nodes[p].len = distmax;
00995                 no = p;
00996                 p = Nodes[p].u.d.father;
00997               }
00998             else
00999               break;
01000           }
01001       }
01002 }
01003 
01004 
01005 
01006 
01014 void force_update_hmax(void)
01015 {
01016   int i, no;
01017   MPI_Status status;
01018   int level, sendTask, recvTask;
01019 
01020   force_update_node_hmax_local();
01021 
01022   for(i = DomainMyStart; i <= DomainMyLast; i++)
01023     {
01024       no = DomainNodeIndex[i];
01025 
01026       DomainHmax[i] = Extnodes[no].hmax;
01027     }
01028 
01029   /* share the hmax-data of the pseudo-particles accross CPUs */
01030 
01031   for(level = 1; level < (1 << PTask); level++)
01032     {
01033       sendTask = ThisTask;
01034       recvTask = ThisTask ^ level;
01035 
01036       if(recvTask < NTask)
01037         MPI_Sendrecv(&DomainHmax[DomainStartList[sendTask]],
01038                      (DomainEndList[sendTask] - DomainStartList[sendTask] + 1) * sizeof(FLOAT),
01039                      MPI_BYTE, recvTask, TAG_HMAX,
01040                      &DomainHmax[DomainStartList[recvTask]],
01041                      (DomainEndList[recvTask] - DomainStartList[recvTask] + 1) * sizeof(FLOAT),
01042                      MPI_BYTE, recvTask, TAG_HMAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
01043     }
01044 
01045 
01046   force_update_node_hmax_toptree();
01047 }
01048 
01051 void force_update_node_hmax_local(void)
01052 {
01053   int i, p, no;
01054 
01055   for(i = 0; i < N_gas; i++)
01056     {
01057 
01058       no = Father[i];
01059 
01060       if(SphP[i].Hsml > Extnodes[no].hmax)
01061         {
01062 
01063           Extnodes[no].hmax = SphP[i].Hsml;
01064           p = Nodes[no].u.d.father;
01065 
01066           while(p >= 0)
01067             {
01068               if(Extnodes[no].hmax > Extnodes[p].hmax)
01069                 {
01070                   Extnodes[p].hmax = Extnodes[no].hmax;
01071                   no = p;
01072                   p = Nodes[p].u.d.father;
01073                 }
01074               else
01075                 break;
01076             }
01077         }
01078 
01079     }
01080 }
01081 
01082 
01083 
01084 
01087 void force_update_node_hmax_toptree(void)
01088 {
01089 
01090   int i, no, p;
01091 
01092 
01093   for(i = 0; i < NTopleaves; i++)
01094     if(i < DomainMyStart || i > DomainMyLast)
01095       {
01096         no = DomainNodeIndex[i];
01097 
01098         if(Extnodes[no].hmax < DomainHmax[i])
01099           Extnodes[no].hmax = DomainHmax[i];
01100 
01101         p = Nodes[no].u.d.father;
01102 
01103         while(p >= 0)
01104           {
01105             if(Extnodes[no].hmax > Extnodes[p].hmax)
01106               {
01107                 Extnodes[p].hmax = Extnodes[no].hmax;
01108                 no = p;
01109                 p = Nodes[p].u.d.father;
01110               }
01111             else
01112               break;
01113           }
01114       }
01115 }
01116 
01117 
01118 
01119 
01120 
01126 int force_treeevaluate(int target, int mode, double *ewaldcountsum)
01127 {
01128   struct NODE *nop = 0;
01129   int no, ninteractions, ptype;
01130   double r2, dx, dy, dz, mass, r, fac, u, h, h_inv, h3_inv;
01131   double acc_x, acc_y, acc_z, pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, aold;
01132 #if defined(UNEQUALSOFTENINGS) && !defined(ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS)
01133   int maxsofttype;
01134 #endif
01135 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
01136   double soft = 0;
01137 #endif
01138 #ifdef PERIODIC
01139   double boxsize, boxhalf;
01140 
01141   boxsize = All.BoxSize;
01142   boxhalf = 0.5 * All.BoxSize;
01143 #endif
01144 
01145 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01146   double  dist_to_center,kick_x,kick_y,kick_z,kick_target[3],kick_no[3],prob;
01147   FLOAT  targetVel[3];
01148   int targetBegstep,targetEndstep;
01149   int si_count,i;
01150   kick_x = 0;
01151   kick_y = 0;
01152   kick_z = 0;
01153   si_count = 0;
01154   if(mode == 0)
01155   {
01156     for(i=0;i<3;i++)
01157       targetVel[i] = P[target].Vel[i];
01158     targetBegstep = P[target].Ti_begstep;
01159     targetEndstep = P[target].Ti_endstep;
01160   }
01161   else
01162   {
01163     for(i=0;i<3;i++)
01164       targetVel[i] = GravDataGet[target].u.Vel[i];
01165     targetBegstep = GravDataGet[target].u.Ti_begstep;
01166     targetEndstep = GravDataGet[target].u.Ti_endstep;
01167   }
01168 #endif
01169 
01170   acc_x = 0;
01171   acc_y = 0;
01172   acc_z = 0;
01173   ninteractions = 0;
01174 
01175   if(mode == 0)
01176     {
01177       pos_x = P[target].Pos[0];
01178       pos_y = P[target].Pos[1];
01179       pos_z = P[target].Pos[2];
01180       ptype = P[target].Type;
01181       aold = All.ErrTolForceAcc * P[target].OldAcc;
01182 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
01183       if(ptype == 0)
01184         soft = SphP[target].Hsml;
01185 #endif
01186     }
01187   else
01188     {
01189       pos_x = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[0];
01190       pos_y = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[1];
01191       pos_z = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[2];
01192 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
01193       ptype = GravDataGet[target].Type;
01194 #else
01195       ptype = P[0].Type;
01196 #endif
01197       aold = All.ErrTolForceAcc * GravDataGet[target].w.OldAcc;
01198 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
01199       if(ptype == 0)
01200         soft = GravDataGet[target].Soft;
01201 #endif
01202     }
01203 
01204 
01205 
01206 #ifndef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
01207   h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
01208   h_inv = 1.0 / h;
01209   h3_inv = h_inv * h_inv * h_inv;
01210 #endif
01211   no = All.MaxPart;             /* root node */
01212 
01213   while(no >= 0)
01214     {
01215       if(no < All.MaxPart)      /* single particle */
01216         {
01217           /* the index of the node is the index of the particle */
01218           /* observe the sign */
01219 
01220           dx = P[no].Pos[0] - pos_x;
01221           dy = P[no].Pos[1] - pos_y;
01222           dz = P[no].Pos[2] - pos_z;
01223 
01224           mass = P[no].Mass;
01225         }
01226       else
01227         {
01228           if(no >= All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)      /* pseudo particle */
01229             {
01230               if(mode == 0)
01231                 {
01232                   Exportflag[DomainTask[no - (All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)]] = 1;
01233                 }
01234               no = Nextnode[no - MaxNodes];
01235               continue;
01236             }
01237           nop = &Nodes[no];
01238           dx = nop->u.d.s[0] - pos_x;
01239           dy = nop->u.d.s[1] - pos_y;
01240           dz = nop->u.d.s[2] - pos_z;
01241 
01242           mass = nop->u.d.mass;
01243         }
01244 #ifdef PERIODIC
01245       dx = NEAREST(dx);
01246       dy = NEAREST(dy);
01247       dz = NEAREST(dz);
01248 #endif
01249       r2 = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
01250 
01251       if(no < All.MaxPart)
01252         {
01253 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
01254 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
01255           if(ptype == 0)
01256             h = soft;
01257           else
01258             h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
01259 
01260           if(P[no].Type == 0)
01261             {
01262               if(h < SphP[no].Hsml)
01263                 h = SphP[no].Hsml;
01264             }
01265           else
01266             {
01267               if(h < All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type])
01268                 h = All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type];
01269             }
01270 #else
01271           h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
01272           if(h < All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type])
01273             h = All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type];
01274 #endif
01275 #endif
01276           no = Nextnode[no];
01277         }
01278       else                      /* we have an  internal node. Need to check opening criterion */
01279         {
01280           if(mode == 1)
01281             {
01282               if((nop->u.d.bitflags & 3) == 1)  /* if it's a top-level node
01283                                                  * which does not contain
01284                                                  * local particles we can
01285                                                  * continue to do a short-cut */
01286                 {
01287                   no = nop->u.d.sibling;
01288                   continue;
01289                 }
01290             }
01291 
01292 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01293           dist_to_center = sqrt((nop->center[0] - pos_x)*(nop->center[0] - pos_x) + 
01294                                 (nop->center[1] - pos_y)*(nop->center[1] - pos_y) +
01295                                 (nop->center[2] - pos_z)*(nop->center[2] - pos_z));
01296            /* check if any portion the cell lies withing the intercation range */
01297           if(dist_to_center - nop->len * sqrt(3.0) / 2.0 < 2.0 * All.ForceSoftening[1])
01298             {
01299               /* open cell */
01300               no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01301               continue;
01302             }
01303 #else
01304 
01305           if(All.ErrTolTheta)   /* check Barnes-Hut opening criterion */
01306             {
01307               if(nop->len * nop->len > r2 * All.ErrTolTheta * All.ErrTolTheta)
01308                 {
01309                   /* open cell */
01310                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01311                   continue;
01312                 }
01313             }
01314           else                  /* check relative opening criterion */
01315             {
01316               if(mass * nop->len * nop->len > r2 * r2 * aold)
01317                 {
01318                   /* open cell */
01319                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01320                   continue;
01321                 }
01322 
01323               /* check in addition whether we lie inside the cell */
01324 
01325               if(fabs(nop->center[0] - pos_x) < 0.60 * nop->len)
01326                 {
01327                   if(fabs(nop->center[1] - pos_y) < 0.60 * nop->len)
01328                     {
01329                       if(fabs(nop->center[2] - pos_z) < 0.60 * nop->len)
01330                         {
01331                           no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01332                           continue;
01333                         }
01334                     }
01335                 }
01336             }
01337 #endif
01338 
01339 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
01340 #ifndef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
01341           h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
01342           maxsofttype = (nop->u.d.bitflags >> 2) & 7;
01343           if(maxsofttype == 7) /* may only occur for zero mass top-level nodes */
01344             {
01345               if(mass > 0)
01346                 endrun(986);
01347               no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01348               continue;
01349             }
01350           else
01351             {
01352               if(h < All.ForceSoftening[maxsofttype])
01353                 {
01354                   h = All.ForceSoftening[maxsofttype];
01355                   if(r2 < h * h)
01356                     {
01357                       if(((nop->u.d.bitflags >> 5) & 1))        /* bit-5 signals that there are particles of different softening in the node */
01358                         {
01359                           no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01360                           continue;
01361                         }
01362                     }
01363                 }
01364             }
01365 #else
01366           if(ptype == 0)
01367             h = soft;
01368           else
01369             h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
01370 
01371           if(h < nop->maxsoft)
01372             {
01373               h = nop->maxsoft;
01374               if(r2 < h * h)
01375                 {
01376                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01377                   continue;
01378                 }
01379             }
01380 #endif
01381 #endif
01382 
01383           no = nop->u.d.sibling;        /* ok, node can be used */
01384 
01385           if(mode == 1)
01386             {
01387               if(((nop->u.d.bitflags) & 1))     /* Bit 0 signals that this node belongs to top-level tree */
01388                 continue;
01389             }
01390         }
01391 
01392       r = sqrt(r2);
01393 
01394       if(r >= h)
01395         fac = mass / (r2 * r);
01396       else
01397         {
01398 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
01399           h_inv = 1.0 / h;
01400           h3_inv = h_inv * h_inv * h_inv;
01401 #endif
01402           u = r * h_inv;
01403           if(u < 0.5)
01404             fac = mass * h3_inv * (10.666666666667 + u * u * (32.0 * u - 38.4));
01405           else
01406             fac =
01407               mass * h3_inv * (21.333333333333 - 48.0 * u +
01408                                38.4 * u * u - 10.666666666667 * u * u * u - 0.066666666667 / (u * u * u));
01409         }
01410       
01411         acc_x += dx * fac;
01412         acc_y += dy * fac;
01413         acc_z += dz * fac;
01414 
01415 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01416         if (no < All.MaxPart)
01417           {
01418             if (ptype == 1 && P[no].Type == 1)
01419               {
01420                 if (r < 2.0 * h)
01421                   {
01422                     prob = prob_of_interaction(r, targetVel, P[no].Vel, targetBegstep, targetEndstep);
01423                     if (get_random_number(P[no].ID) < prob)
01424                       {
01425                         calculate_interact_kick(targetVel, P[no].Vel, kick_target, kick_no);
01426                         kick_x += kick_target[0];
01427                         kick_y += kick_target[1];
01428                         kick_z += kick_target[2];
01429                         for (i = 0; i < 3 ; i++)
01430                           P[no].Vel[i] += kick_no[i];
01431                         si_count+=1;
01432                       }
01433                   }
01434               }
01435           }
01436 #endif
01437       ninteractions++;
01438     }
01439   
01440 
01441 
01442   /* store result at the proper place */
01443   if(mode == 0)
01444     {
01445       P[target].GravAccel[0] = acc_x;
01446       P[target].GravAccel[1] = acc_y;
01447       P[target].GravAccel[2] = acc_z;
01448       P[target].GravCost = ninteractions;
01449 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01450       P[target].Vel[0] += kick_x;
01451       P[target].Vel[1] += kick_y;
01452       P[target].Vel[2] += kick_z;
01453 #endif
01454     }
01455   else
01456     {
01457       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[0] = acc_x;
01458       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[1] = acc_y;
01459       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[2] = acc_z;
01460       GravDataResult[target].w.Ninteractions = ninteractions;
01461 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01462       GravDataResult[target].u.Vel[0] = kick_x;
01463       GravDataResult[target].u.Vel[1] = kick_y;
01464       GravDataResult[target].u.Vel[2] = kick_z;
01465 #endif
01466     }
01467 
01468 #ifdef PERIODIC
01469   *ewaldcountsum += force_treeevaluate_ewald_correction(target, mode, pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, aold);
01470 #endif
01471 
01472   return ninteractions;
01473 }
01474 
01475 
01476 
01477 
01478 
01479 
01480 #ifdef PMGRID
01481 
01491 int force_treeevaluate_shortrange(int target, int mode)
01492 {
01493   struct NODE *nop = 0;
01494   int no, ptype, ninteractions, tabindex;
01495   double r2, dx, dy, dz, mass, r, fac, u, h, h_inv, h3_inv;
01496   double acc_x, acc_y, acc_z, pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, aold;
01497   double eff_dist;
01498   double rcut, asmth, asmthfac, rcut2, dist;
01499 #if defined(UNEQUALSOFTENINGS) && !defined(ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS)
01500   int maxsofttype;
01501 #endif
01502 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
01503   double soft = 0;
01504 #endif
01505 #ifdef PERIODIC
01506   double boxsize, boxhalf;
01507 
01508   boxsize = All.BoxSize;
01509   boxhalf = 0.5 * All.BoxSize;
01510 #endif
01511 
01512 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01513   double  dist_to_center,kick_x,kick_y,kick_z,kick_target[3],kick_no[3],prob;
01514   FLOAT targetVel[3];
01515   int targetBegstep,targetEndstep;
01516   int si_count,i;
01517   kick_x = 0;
01518   kick_y = 0;
01519   kick_z = 0;
01520   si_count = 0;
01521   if(mode == 0)
01522     {
01523       for(i=0;i<3;i++)
01524         targetVel[i] = P[target].Vel[i];
01525       targetBegstep = P[target].Ti_begstep;
01526       targetEndstep = P[target].Ti_endstep;
01527     }
01528   else
01529     {
01530       for(i=0;i<3;i++)
01531         targetVel[i] = GravDataGet[target].u.Vel[i];
01532       targetBegstep = GravDataGet[target].u.Ti_begstep;
01533       targetEndstep = GravDataGet[target].u.Ti_endstep;
01534     }
01535 #endif
01536 
01537   acc_x = 0;
01538   acc_y = 0;
01539   acc_z = 0;
01540   ninteractions = 0;
01541 
01542   if(mode == 0)
01543     {
01544       pos_x = P[target].Pos[0];
01545       pos_y = P[target].Pos[1];
01546       pos_z = P[target].Pos[2];
01547       ptype = P[target].Type;
01548       aold = All.ErrTolForceAcc * P[target].OldAcc;
01549 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
01550       if(ptype == 0)
01551         soft = SphP[target].Hsml;
01552 #endif
01553     }
01554   else
01555     {
01556       pos_x = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[0];
01557       pos_y = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[1];
01558       pos_z = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[2];
01559 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
01560       ptype = GravDataGet[target].Type;
01561 #else
01562       ptype = P[0].Type;
01563 #endif
01564       aold = All.ErrTolForceAcc * GravDataGet[target].w.OldAcc;
01565 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
01566       if(ptype == 0)
01567         soft = GravDataGet[target].Soft;
01568 #endif
01569     }
01570 
01571   rcut = All.Rcut[0];
01572   asmth = All.Asmth[0];
01573 #ifdef PLACEHIGHRESREGION
01574   if(((1 << ptype) & (PLACEHIGHRESREGION)))
01575     {
01576       rcut = All.Rcut[1];
01577       asmth = All.Asmth[1];
01578     }
01579 #endif
01580   rcut2 = rcut * rcut;
01581 
01582   asmthfac = 0.5 / asmth * (NTAB / 3.0);
01583 
01584 #ifndef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
01585   h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
01586   h_inv = 1.0 / h;
01587   h3_inv = h_inv * h_inv * h_inv;
01588 #endif
01589   no = All.MaxPart;             /* root node */
01590 
01591   while(no >= 0)
01592     {
01593       if(no < All.MaxPart)
01594         {
01595           /* the index of the node is the index of the particle */
01596           dx = P[no].Pos[0] - pos_x;
01597           dy = P[no].Pos[1] - pos_y;
01598           dz = P[no].Pos[2] - pos_z;
01599 #ifdef PERIODIC
01600           dx = NEAREST(dx);
01601           dy = NEAREST(dy);
01602           dz = NEAREST(dz);
01603 #endif
01604           r2 = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
01605 
01606           mass = P[no].Mass;
01607 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
01608 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
01609           if(ptype == 0)
01610             h = soft;
01611           else
01612             h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
01613 
01614           if(P[no].Type == 0)
01615             {
01616               if(h < SphP[no].Hsml)
01617                 h = SphP[no].Hsml;
01618             }
01619           else
01620             {
01621               if(h < All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type])
01622                 h = All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type];
01623             }
01624 #else
01625           h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
01626           if(h < All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type])
01627             h = All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type];
01628 #endif
01629 #endif
01630           no = Nextnode[no];
01631         }
01632       else                      /* we have an  internal node */
01633         {
01634           if(no >= All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)      /* pseudo particle */
01635             {
01636               if(mode == 0)
01637                 {
01638                   Exportflag[DomainTask[no - (All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)]] = 1;
01639                 }
01640               no = Nextnode[no - MaxNodes];
01641               continue;
01642             }
01643 
01644           nop = &Nodes[no];
01645 
01646           if(mode == 1)
01647             {
01648               if((nop->u.d.bitflags & 3) == 1)  /* if it's a top-level node
01649                                                  * which does not contain
01650                                                  * local particles we can
01651                                                  * continue at this point
01652                                                  */
01653                 {
01654                   no = nop->u.d.sibling;
01655                   continue;
01656                 }
01657             }
01658 
01659           mass = nop->u.d.mass;
01660 
01661           dx = nop->u.d.s[0] - pos_x;
01662           dy = nop->u.d.s[1] - pos_y;
01663           dz = nop->u.d.s[2] - pos_z;
01664 #ifdef PERIODIC
01665           dx = NEAREST(dx);
01666           dy = NEAREST(dy);
01667           dz = NEAREST(dz);
01668 #endif
01669           r2 = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
01670 
01671           if(r2 > rcut2)
01672             {
01673               /* check whether we can stop walking along this branch */
01674               eff_dist = rcut + 0.5 * nop->len;
01675 #ifdef PERIODIC
01676               dist = NEAREST(nop->center[0] - pos_x);
01677 #else
01678               dist = nop->center[0] - pos_x;
01679 #endif
01680               if(dist < -eff_dist || dist > eff_dist)
01681                 {
01682                   no = nop->u.d.sibling;
01683                   continue;
01684                 }
01685 #ifdef PERIODIC
01686               dist = NEAREST(nop->center[1] - pos_y);
01687 #else
01688               dist = nop->center[1] - pos_y;
01689 #endif
01690               if(dist < -eff_dist || dist > eff_dist)
01691                 {
01692                   no = nop->u.d.sibling;
01693                   continue;
01694                 }
01695 #ifdef PERIODIC
01696               dist = NEAREST(nop->center[2] - pos_z);
01697 #else
01698               dist = nop->center[2] - pos_z;
01699 #endif
01700               if(dist < -eff_dist || dist > eff_dist)
01701                 {
01702                   no = nop->u.d.sibling;
01703                   continue;
01704                 }
01705             }
01706 
01707 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01708           dist_to_center = sqrt((nop->center[0] - pos_x)*(nop->center[0] - pos_x) + 
01709                                 (nop->center[1] - pos_y)*(nop->center[1] - pos_y) +
01710                                 (nop->center[2] - pos_z)*(nop->center[2] - pos_z));
01711           /*check if any portion the cell lies withing the intercation range */
01712           if(dist_to_center - nop->len * sqrt(3.0) / 2.0 < 2.0 * All.ForceSoftening[1])
01713             {
01714               /* open cell */
01715               no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01716               continue;
01717             }
01718 #endif
01719 
01720           if(All.ErrTolTheta)   /* check Barnes-Hut opening criterion */
01721             {
01722               if(nop->len * nop->len > r2 * All.ErrTolTheta * All.ErrTolTheta)
01723                 {
01724                   /* open cell */
01725                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01726                   continue;
01727                 }
01728             }
01729           else                  /* check relative opening criterion */
01730             {
01731               if(mass * nop->len * nop->len > r2 * r2 * aold)
01732                 {
01733                   /* open cell */
01734                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01735                   continue;
01736                 }
01737 
01738               /* check in addition whether we lie inside the cell */
01739 
01740               if(fabs(nop->center[0] - pos_x) < 0.60 * nop->len)
01741                 {
01742                   if(fabs(nop->center[1] - pos_y) < 0.60 * nop->len)
01743                     {
01744                       if(fabs(nop->center[2] - pos_z) < 0.60 * nop->len)
01745                         {
01746                           no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01747                           continue;
01748                         }
01749                     }
01750                 }
01751             }
01752 
01753 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
01754 #ifndef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
01755           h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
01756           maxsofttype = (nop->u.d.bitflags >> 2) & 7;
01757           if(maxsofttype == 7) /* may only occur for zero mass top-level nodes */
01758             {
01759               if(mass > 0)
01760                 endrun(987);
01761               no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01762               continue;
01763             }
01764           else
01765             {
01766               if(h < All.ForceSoftening[maxsofttype])
01767                 {
01768                   h = All.ForceSoftening[maxsofttype];
01769                   if(r2 < h * h)
01770                     {
01771                       if(((nop->u.d.bitflags >> 5) & 1))        /* bit-5 signals that there are particles of different softening in the node */
01772                         {
01773                           no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01774                           
01775                           continue;
01776                         }
01777                     }
01778                 }
01779             }
01780 #else
01781           if(ptype == 0)
01782             h = soft;
01783           else
01784             h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
01785 
01786           if(h < nop->maxsoft)
01787             {
01788               h = nop->maxsoft;
01789               if(r2 < h * h)
01790                 {
01791                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01792                   continue;
01793                 }
01794             }
01795 #endif
01796 #endif
01797           no = nop->u.d.sibling;        /* ok, node can be used */
01798 
01799           if(mode == 1)
01800             {
01801               if(((nop->u.d.bitflags) & 1))     /* Bit 0 signals that this node belongs to top-level tree */
01802                 continue;
01803             }
01804         }
01805 
01806       r = sqrt(r2);
01807 
01808       if(r >= h)
01809         fac = mass / (r2 * r);
01810       else
01811         {
01812 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
01813           h_inv = 1.0 / h;
01814           h3_inv = h_inv * h_inv * h_inv;
01815 #endif
01816           u = r * h_inv;
01817           if(u < 0.5)
01818             fac = mass * h3_inv * (10.666666666667 + u * u * (32.0 * u - 38.4));
01819           else
01820             fac =
01821               mass * h3_inv * (21.333333333333 - 48.0 * u +
01822                                38.4 * u * u - 10.666666666667 * u * u * u - 0.066666666667 / (u * u * u));
01823         }
01824 
01825       tabindex = (int) (asmthfac * r);
01826 
01827       if(tabindex < NTAB)
01828         {
01829           fac *= shortrange_table[tabindex];
01830 
01831           acc_x += dx * fac;
01832           acc_y += dy * fac;
01833           acc_z += dz * fac;
01834         
01835 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01836           if(no < All.MaxPart)
01837             {
01838               if(ptype == 1 && P[no].Type == 1)
01839                 {
01840                   if(r < 2.0 * h)
01841                     {
01842                       prob = prob_of_interaction(r, targetVel, P[no].Vel, targetBegstep, targetEndstep);
01843                       if(get_random_number(P[no].ID) < prob)
01844                         {
01845                           calculate_interact_kick(targetVel, P[no].Vel, kick_target, kick_no);
01846                           kick_x += kick_target[0];
01847                           kick_y += kick_target[1];
01848                           kick_z += kick_target[2];
01849                           for(i = 0; i < 3 ; i++)
01850                               P[no].Vel[i] += kick_no[i];
01851                           si_count+=1;
01852                         }
01853                     }
01854                 }
01855             }
01856 #endif
01857           ninteractions++;
01858         }
01859     }
01860 
01861 
01862   /* store result at the proper place */
01863 
01864   if(mode == 0)
01865     {
01866       P[target].GravAccel[0] = acc_x;
01867       P[target].GravAccel[1] = acc_y;
01868       P[target].GravAccel[2] = acc_z;
01869       P[target].GravCost = ninteractions;
01870 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01871       P[target].Vel[0] += kick_x;
01872       P[target].Vel[1] += kick_y;
01873       P[target].Vel[2] += kick_z;
01874 #endif
01875     }
01876   else
01877     {
01878       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[0] = acc_x;
01879       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[1] = acc_y;
01880       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[2] = acc_z;
01881       GravDataResult[target].w.Ninteractions = ninteractions;
01882 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01883       GravDataResult[target].u.Vel[0] = kick_x;
01884       GravDataResult[target].u.Vel[1] = kick_y;
01885       GravDataResult[target].u.Vel[2] = kick_z;
01886 #endif
01887     }
01888 
01889   return ninteractions;
01890 }
01891 
01892 #endif
01893 
01894 
01895 
01896 #ifdef PERIODIC
01897 
01915 int force_treeevaluate_ewald_correction(int target, int mode, double pos_x, double pos_y, double pos_z,
01916                                         double aold)
01917 {
01918   struct NODE *nop = 0;
01919   int no, cost;
01920   double dx, dy, dz, mass, r2;
01921   int signx, signy, signz;
01922   int i, j, k, openflag;
01923   double u, v, w;
01924   double f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6, f7, f8;
01925   double acc_x, acc_y, acc_z;
01926   double boxsize, boxhalf;
01927 
01928   boxsize = All.BoxSize;
01929   boxhalf = 0.5 * All.BoxSize;
01930 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01931   double  dist_to_center;
01932 #endif
01933   
01934   acc_x = 0;
01935   acc_y = 0;
01936   acc_z = 0;
01937   cost = 0;
01938 
01939   no = All.MaxPart;
01940 
01941   while(no >= 0)
01942     {
01943       if(no < All.MaxPart)      /* single particle */
01944         {
01945           /* the index of the node is the index of the particle */
01946           /* observe the sign */
01947 
01948           dx = P[no].Pos[0] - pos_x;
01949           dy = P[no].Pos[1] - pos_y;
01950           dz = P[no].Pos[2] - pos_z;
01951           mass = P[no].Mass;
01952         }
01953       else
01954         {
01955           if(no >= All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)      /* pseudo particle */
01956             {
01957               if(mode == 0)
01958                 {
01959                   Exportflag[DomainTask[no - (All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)]] = 1;
01960                 }
01961 
01962               no = Nextnode[no - MaxNodes];
01963               continue;
01964             }
01965 
01966           nop = &Nodes[no];
01967           dx = nop->u.d.s[0] - pos_x;
01968           dy = nop->u.d.s[1] - pos_y;
01969           dz = nop->u.d.s[2] - pos_z;
01970           mass = nop->u.d.mass;
01971         }
01972 
01973       dx = NEAREST(dx);
01974       dy = NEAREST(dy);
01975       dz = NEAREST(dz);
01976 
01977       if(no < All.MaxPart)
01978         no = Nextnode[no];
01979       else                      /* we have an  internal node. Need to check opening criterion */
01980         {
01981           openflag = 0;
01982 
01983           r2 = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
01984         
01985 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
01986           dist_to_center = sqrt((nop->center[0] - pos_x)*(nop->center[0] - pos_x) +
01987                               (nop->center[1] - pos_y)*(nop->center[1] - pos_y) +
01988                               (nop->center[2] - pos_z)*(nop->center[2] - pos_z));
01989           /*check if any portion the cell lies withing the intercation range*/
01990         if(dist_to_center - nop->len * sqrt(3.0) / 2.0 < 2.0 * All.ForceSoftening[1])
01991             {
01992               /* open cell */
01993               no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
01994               continue;
01995             }
01996 #endif
01997 
01998           if(All.ErrTolTheta)   /* check Barnes-Hut opening criterion */
01999             {
02000               if(nop->len * nop->len > r2 * All.ErrTolTheta * All.ErrTolTheta)
02001                 {
02002                   openflag = 1;
02003                 }
02004             }
02005           else                  /* check relative opening criterion */
02006             {
02007               if(mass * nop->len * nop->len > r2 * r2 * aold)
02008                 {
02009                   openflag = 1;
02010                 }
02011               else
02012                 {
02013                   if(fabs(nop->center[0] - pos_x) < 0.60 * nop->len)
02014                     {
02015                       if(fabs(nop->center[1] - pos_y) < 0.60 * nop->len)
02016                         {
02017                           if(fabs(nop->center[2] - pos_z) < 0.60 * nop->len)
02018                             {
02019                               openflag = 1;
02020                             }
02021                         }
02022                     }
02023                 }
02024             }
02025 
02026           if(openflag)
02027             {
02028               /* now we check if we can avoid opening the cell */
02029 
02030               u = nop->center[0] - pos_x;
02031               if(u > boxhalf)
02032                 u -= boxsize;
02033               if(u < -boxhalf)
02034                 u += boxsize;
02035 
02036               if(fabs(u) > 0.5 * (boxsize - nop->len))
02037                 {
02038                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02039                   continue;
02040                 }
02041 
02042               u = nop->center[1] - pos_y;
02043               if(u > boxhalf)
02044                 u -= boxsize;
02045               if(u < -boxhalf)
02046                 u += boxsize;
02047 
02048               if(fabs(u) > 0.5 * (boxsize - nop->len))
02049                 {
02050                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02051                   continue;
02052                 }
02053 
02054               u = nop->center[2] - pos_z;
02055               if(u > boxhalf)
02056                 u -= boxsize;
02057               if(u < -boxhalf)
02058                 u += boxsize;
02059 
02060               if(fabs(u) > 0.5 * (boxsize - nop->len))
02061                 {
02062                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02063                   continue;
02064                 }
02065 
02066               /* if the cell is too large, we need to refine
02067                * it further 
02068                */
02069               if(nop->len > 0.20 * boxsize)
02070                 {
02071                   /* cell is too large */
02072                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02073                   continue;
02074                 }
02075             }
02076 
02077           no = nop->u.d.sibling;        /* ok, node can be used */
02078 
02079           if(mode == 1)
02080             {
02081               if((nop->u.d.bitflags & 1))       /* Bit 0 signals that this node belongs to top-level tree */
02082                 continue;
02083             }
02084         }
02085 
02086       /* compute the Ewald correction force */
02087 
02088       if(dx < 0)
02089         {
02090           dx = -dx;
02091           signx = +1;
02092         }
02093       else
02094         signx = -1;
02095 
02096       if(dy < 0)
02097         {
02098           dy = -dy;
02099           signy = +1;
02100         }
02101       else
02102         signy = -1;
02103 
02104       if(dz < 0)
02105         {
02106           dz = -dz;
02107           signz = +1;
02108         }
02109       else
02110         signz = -1;
02111 
02112       u = dx * fac_intp;
02113       i = (int) u;
02114       if(i >= EN)
02115         i = EN - 1;
02116       u -= i;
02117       v = dy * fac_intp;
02118       j = (int) v;
02119       if(j >= EN)
02120         j = EN - 1;
02121       v -= j;
02122       w = dz * fac_intp;
02123       k = (int) w;
02124       if(k >= EN)
02125         k = EN - 1;
02126       w -= k;
02127 
02128       /* compute factors for trilinear interpolation */
02129 
02130       f1 = (1 - u) * (1 - v) * (1 - w);
02131       f2 = (1 - u) * (1 - v) * (w);
02132       f3 = (1 - u) * (v) * (1 - w);
02133       f4 = (1 - u) * (v) * (w);
02134       f5 = (u) * (1 - v) * (1 - w);
02135       f6 = (u) * (1 - v) * (w);
02136       f7 = (u) * (v) * (1 - w);
02137       f8 = (u) * (v) * (w);
02138 
02139       acc_x += mass * signx * (fcorrx[i][j][k] * f1 +
02140                                fcorrx[i][j][k + 1] * f2 +
02141                                fcorrx[i][j + 1][k] * f3 +
02142                                fcorrx[i][j + 1][k + 1] * f4 +
02143                                fcorrx[i + 1][j][k] * f5 +
02144                                fcorrx[i + 1][j][k + 1] * f6 +
02145                                fcorrx[i + 1][j + 1][k] * f7 + fcorrx[i + 1][j + 1][k + 1] * f8);
02146 
02147       acc_y += mass * signy * (fcorry[i][j][k] * f1 +
02148                                fcorry[i][j][k + 1] * f2 +
02149                                fcorry[i][j + 1][k] * f3 +
02150                                fcorry[i][j + 1][k + 1] * f4 +
02151                                fcorry[i + 1][j][k] * f5 +
02152                                fcorry[i + 1][j][k + 1] * f6 +
02153                                fcorry[i + 1][j + 1][k] * f7 + fcorry[i + 1][j + 1][k + 1] * f8);
02154 
02155       acc_z += mass * signz * (fcorrz[i][j][k] * f1 +
02156                                fcorrz[i][j][k + 1] * f2 +
02157                                fcorrz[i][j + 1][k] * f3 +
02158                                fcorrz[i][j + 1][k + 1] * f4 +
02159                                fcorrz[i + 1][j][k] * f5 +
02160                                fcorrz[i + 1][j][k + 1] * f6 +
02161                                fcorrz[i + 1][j + 1][k] * f7 + fcorrz[i + 1][j + 1][k + 1] * f8);
02162       cost++;
02163     }
02164 
02165 
02166   /* add the result at the proper place */
02167 
02168   if(mode == 0)
02169     {
02170       P[target].GravAccel[0] += acc_x;
02171       P[target].GravAccel[1] += acc_y;
02172       P[target].GravAccel[2] += acc_z;
02173       P[target].GravCost += cost;
02174     }
02175   else
02176     {
02177       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[0] += acc_x;
02178       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[1] += acc_y;
02179       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[2] += acc_z;
02180       GravDataResult[target].w.Ninteractions += cost;
02181     }
02182 
02183   return cost;
02184 }
02185 
02186 #endif
02187 
02188 
02189 
02190 
02191 
02192 
02197 void force_treeevaluate_potential(int target, int mode)
02198 {
02199   struct NODE *nop = 0;
02200   int no, ptype;
02201   double r2, dx, dy, dz, mass, r, u, h, h_inv, wp;
02202   double pot, pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, aold;
02203 #if defined(UNEQUALSOFTENINGS) && !defined(ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS)
02204   int maxsofttype;
02205 #endif
02206 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
02207   double soft = 0;
02208 #endif
02209 #ifdef PERIODIC
02210   double boxsize, boxhalf;
02211 
02212   boxsize = All.BoxSize;
02213   boxhalf = 0.5 * All.BoxSize;
02214 #endif
02215 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
02216   double  dist_to_center;
02217 #endif
02218   
02219   pot = 0;
02220 
02221   if(mode == 0)
02222     {
02223       pos_x = P[target].Pos[0];
02224       pos_y = P[target].Pos[1];
02225       pos_z = P[target].Pos[2];
02226       ptype = P[target].Type;
02227       aold = All.ErrTolForceAcc * P[target].OldAcc;
02228 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
02229       if(ptype == 0)
02230         soft = SphP[target].Hsml;
02231 #endif
02232     }
02233   else
02234     {
02235       pos_x = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[0];
02236       pos_y = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[1];
02237       pos_z = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[2];
02238 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
02239       ptype = GravDataGet[target].Type;
02240 #else
02241       ptype = P[0].Type;
02242 #endif
02243       aold = All.ErrTolForceAcc * GravDataGet[target].w.OldAcc;
02244 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
02245       if(ptype == 0)
02246         soft = GravDataGet[target].Soft;
02247 #endif
02248     }
02249 
02250 
02251 #ifndef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
02252   h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
02253   h_inv = 1.0 / h;
02254 #endif
02255   no = All.MaxPart;
02256 
02257   while(no >= 0)
02258     {
02259       if(no < All.MaxPart)      /* single particle */
02260         {
02261           /* the index of the node is the index of the particle */
02262           /* observe the sign */
02263 
02264           dx = P[no].Pos[0] - pos_x;
02265           dy = P[no].Pos[1] - pos_y;
02266           dz = P[no].Pos[2] - pos_z;
02267           mass = P[no].Mass;
02268         }
02269       else
02270         {
02271           if(no >= All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)      /* pseudo particle */
02272             {
02273               if(mode == 0)
02274                 {
02275                   Exportflag[DomainTask[no - (All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)]] = 1;
02276                 }
02277               no = Nextnode[no - MaxNodes];
02278               continue;
02279             }
02280 
02281           nop = &Nodes[no];
02282           dx = nop->u.d.s[0] - pos_x;
02283           dy = nop->u.d.s[1] - pos_y;
02284           dz = nop->u.d.s[2] - pos_z;
02285           mass = nop->u.d.mass;
02286         }
02287 
02288 #ifdef PERIODIC
02289       dx = NEAREST(dx);
02290       dy = NEAREST(dy);
02291       dz = NEAREST(dz);
02292 #endif
02293       r2 = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
02294 
02295       if(no < All.MaxPart)
02296         {
02297 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
02298 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
02299           if(ptype == 0)
02300             h = soft;
02301           else
02302             h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
02303 
02304           if(P[no].Type == 0)
02305             {
02306               if(h < SphP[no].Hsml)
02307                 h = SphP[no].Hsml;
02308             }
02309           else
02310             {
02311               if(h < All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type])
02312                 h = All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type];
02313             }
02314 #else
02315           h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
02316           if(h < All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type])
02317             h = All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type];
02318 #endif
02319 #endif
02320           no = Nextnode[no];
02321         }
02322       else                      /* we have an internal node. Need to check opening criterion */
02323         {
02324           if(mode == 1)
02325             {
02326               if((nop->u.d.bitflags & 3) == 1)  /* if it's a top-level node
02327                                                  * which does not contain
02328                                                  * local particles we can make
02329                                                  * a short-cut 
02330                                                  */
02331                 {
02332                   no = nop->u.d.sibling;
02333                   continue;
02334                 }
02335             }
02336 
02337 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
02338           dist_to_center = sqrt((nop->center[0] - pos_x)*(nop->center[0] - pos_x) + 
02339                                 (nop->center[1] - pos_y)*(nop->center[1] - pos_y) +
02340                                 (nop->center[2] - pos_z)*(nop->center[2] - pos_z));
02341            /*check if any portion the cell lies withing the intercation range*/
02342           if(dist_to_center - nop->len * sqrt(3.0) / 2.0 < 2.0 * All.ForceSoftening[1])
02343           {
02344             /* open cell */
02345             no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02346             continue;
02347           }
02348 #endif
02349         
02350           if(All.ErrTolTheta)   /* check Barnes-Hut opening criterion */
02351             {
02352               if(nop->len * nop->len > r2 * All.ErrTolTheta * All.ErrTolTheta)
02353                 {
02354                   /* open cell */
02355                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02356                   continue;
02357                 }
02358             }
02359           else                  /* check relative opening criterion */
02360             {
02361               if(mass * nop->len * nop->len > r2 * r2 * aold)
02362                 {
02363                   /* open cell */
02364                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02365                   continue;
02366                 }
02367 
02368               if(fabs(nop->center[0] - pos_x) < 0.60 * nop->len)
02369                 {
02370                   if(fabs(nop->center[1] - pos_y) < 0.60 * nop->len)
02371                     {
02372                       if(fabs(nop->center[2] - pos_z) < 0.60 * nop->len)
02373                         {
02374                           no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02375                           continue;
02376                         }
02377                     }
02378                 }
02379             }
02380 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
02381 #ifndef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
02382           h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
02383           maxsofttype = (nop->u.d.bitflags >> 2) & 7;
02384           if(maxsofttype == 7) /* may only occur for zero mass top-level nodes */
02385             {
02386               if(mass > 0)
02387                 endrun(988);
02388               no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02389               continue;
02390             }
02391           else
02392             {
02393               if(h < All.ForceSoftening[maxsofttype])
02394                 {
02395                   h = All.ForceSoftening[maxsofttype];
02396                   if(r2 < h * h)
02397                     {
02398                       if(((nop->u.d.bitflags >> 5) & 1))        /* bit-5 signals that there are particles of different softening in the node */
02399                         {
02400                           no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02401                           continue;
02402                         }
02403                     }
02404                 }
02405             }
02406 #else
02407           if(ptype == 0)
02408             h = soft;
02409           else
02410             h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
02411 
02412           if(h < nop->maxsoft)
02413             {
02414               h = nop->maxsoft;
02415               if(r2 < h * h)
02416                 {
02417                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02418                   continue;
02419                 }
02420             }
02421 #endif
02422 #endif
02423 
02424           no = nop->u.d.sibling;        /* node can be used */
02425 
02426           if(mode == 1)
02427             {
02428               if(((nop->u.d.bitflags) & 1))     /* Bit 0 signals that this node belongs to top-level tree */
02429                 continue;
02430             }
02431         }
02432 
02433       r = sqrt(r2);
02434 
02435       if(r >= h)
02436         pot -= mass / r;
02437       else
02438         {
02439 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
02440           h_inv = 1.0 / h;
02441 #endif
02442           u = r * h_inv;
02443 
02444           if(u < 0.5)
02445             wp = -2.8 + u * u * (5.333333333333 + u * u * (6.4 * u - 9.6));
02446           else
02447             wp =
02448               -3.2 + 0.066666666667 / u + u * u * (10.666666666667 +
02449                                                    u * (-16.0 + u * (9.6 - 2.133333333333 * u)));
02450 
02451           pot += mass * h_inv * wp;
02452         }
02453 #ifdef PERIODIC
02454       pot += mass * ewald_pot_corr(dx, dy, dz);
02455 #endif
02456     }
02457 
02458   /* store result at the proper place */
02459 
02460   if(mode == 0)
02461     P[target].Potential = pot;
02462   else
02463     GravDataResult[target].u.Potential = pot;
02464 }
02465 
02466 
02467 
02468 
02469 #ifdef PMGRID
02470 
02474 void force_treeevaluate_potential_shortrange(int target, int mode)
02475 {
02476   struct NODE *nop = 0;
02477   int no, ptype, tabindex;
02478   double r2, dx, dy, dz, mass, r, u, h, h_inv, wp;
02479   double pot, pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, aold;
02480   double eff_dist, fac, rcut, asmth, asmthfac;
02481   double dxx, dyy, dzz;
02482 #if defined(UNEQUALSOFTENINGS) && !defined(ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS)
02483   int maxsofttype;
02484 #endif
02485 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
02486   double soft = 0;
02487 #endif
02488 
02489 #ifdef PERIODIC
02490   double boxsize, boxhalf;
02491 
02492   boxsize = All.BoxSize;
02493   boxhalf = 0.5 * All.BoxSize;
02494 #endif
02495 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
02496   double  dist_to_center;
02497 #endif
02498 
02499   pot = 0;
02500 
02501   if(mode == 0)
02502     {
02503       pos_x = P[target].Pos[0];
02504       pos_y = P[target].Pos[1];
02505       pos_z = P[target].Pos[2];
02506       ptype = P[target].Type;
02507       aold = All.ErrTolForceAcc * P[target].OldAcc;
02508 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
02509       if(ptype == 0)
02510         soft = SphP[target].Hsml;
02511 #endif
02512     }
02513   else
02514     {
02515       pos_x = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[0];
02516       pos_y = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[1];
02517       pos_z = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[2];
02518 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
02519       ptype = GravDataGet[target].Type;
02520 #else
02521       ptype = P[0].Type;
02522 #endif
02523       aold = All.ErrTolForceAcc * GravDataGet[target].w.OldAcc;
02524 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
02525       if(ptype == 0)
02526         soft = GravDataGet[target].Soft;
02527 #endif
02528     }
02529 
02530 
02531   rcut = All.Rcut[0];
02532   asmth = All.Asmth[0];
02533 #ifdef PLACEHIGHRESREGION
02534   if(((1 << ptype) & (PLACEHIGHRESREGION)))
02535     {
02536       rcut = All.Rcut[1];
02537       asmth = All.Asmth[1];
02538     }
02539 #endif
02540   asmthfac = 0.5 / asmth * (NTAB / 3.0);
02541 
02542 #ifndef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
02543   h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
02544   h_inv = 1.0 / h;
02545 #endif
02546 
02547   no = All.MaxPart;
02548 
02549   while(no >= 0)
02550     {
02551       if(no < All.MaxPart)      /* single particle */
02552         {
02553           /* the index of the node is the index of the particle */
02554           /* observe the sign  */
02555 
02556           dx = P[no].Pos[0] - pos_x;
02557           dy = P[no].Pos[1] - pos_y;
02558           dz = P[no].Pos[2] - pos_z;
02559           mass = P[no].Mass;
02560         }
02561       else
02562         {
02563           if(no >= All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)      /* pseudo particle */
02564             {
02565               if(mode == 0)
02566                 {
02567                   Exportflag[DomainTask[no - (All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)]] = 1;
02568                 }
02569               no = Nextnode[no - MaxNodes];
02570               continue;
02571             }
02572 
02573           nop = &Nodes[no];
02574           dx = nop->u.d.s[0] - pos_x;
02575           dy = nop->u.d.s[1] - pos_y;
02576           dz = nop->u.d.s[2] - pos_z;
02577           mass = nop->u.d.mass;
02578         }
02579 
02580 #ifdef PERIODIC
02581       dx = NEAREST(dx);
02582       dy = NEAREST(dy);
02583       dz = NEAREST(dz);
02584 #endif
02585       r2 = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
02586 
02587       if(no < All.MaxPart)
02588         {
02589 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
02590 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
02591           if(ptype == 0)
02592             h = soft;
02593           else
02594             h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
02595 
02596           if(P[no].Type == 0)
02597             {
02598               if(h < SphP[no].Hsml)
02599                 h = SphP[no].Hsml;
02600             }
02601           else
02602             {
02603               if(h < All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type])
02604                 h = All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type];
02605             }
02606 #else
02607           h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
02608           if(h < All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type])
02609             h = All.ForceSoftening[P[no].Type];
02610 #endif
02611 #endif
02612           no = Nextnode[no];
02613         }
02614       else                      /* we have an  internal node. Need to check opening criterion */
02615         {
02616           /* check whether we can stop walking along this branch */
02617           if(no >= All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)      /* pseudo particle */
02618             {
02619               if(mode == 0)
02620                 {
02621                   Exportflag[DomainTask[no - (All.MaxPart + MaxNodes)]] = 1;
02622                 }
02623               no = Nextnode[no - MaxNodes];
02624               continue;
02625             }
02626 
02627           if(mode == 1)
02628             {
02629               if((nop->u.d.bitflags & 3) == 1)  /* if it's a top-level node which does not contain local particles */
02630                 {
02631                   no = nop->u.d.sibling;
02632                   continue;
02633                 }
02634             }
02635 
02636           eff_dist = rcut + 0.5 * nop->len;
02637 
02638           dxx = nop->center[0] - pos_x; /* observe the sign ! */
02639           dyy = nop->center[1] - pos_y; /* this vector is -y in my thesis notation */
02640           dzz = nop->center[2] - pos_z;
02641 #ifdef PERIODIC
02642           dxx = NEAREST(dxx);
02643           dyy = NEAREST(dyy);
02644           dzz = NEAREST(dzz);
02645 #endif
02646           if(dxx < -eff_dist || dxx > eff_dist)
02647             {
02648               no = nop->u.d.sibling;
02649               continue;
02650             }
02651 
02652           if(dyy < -eff_dist || dyy > eff_dist)
02653             {
02654               no = nop->u.d.sibling;
02655               continue;
02656             }
02657 
02658           if(dzz < -eff_dist || dzz > eff_dist)
02659             {
02660               no = nop->u.d.sibling;
02661               continue;
02662             }
02663 
02664 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
02665           dist_to_center = sqrt((nop->center[0] - pos_x)*(nop->center[0] - pos_x) + 
02666                                 (nop->center[1] - pos_y)*(nop->center[1] - pos_y) +
02667                                 (nop->center[2] - pos_z)*(nop->center[2] - pos_z));
02668            /*check if any portion the cell lies withing the intercation range*/
02669           if(dist_to_center - nop->len * sqrt(3.0) / 2.0 < 2.0 * All.ForceSoftening[1])
02670           {
02671             /* open cell */
02672             no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02673             continue;
02674           }
02675 #endif
02676 
02677           if(All.ErrTolTheta)   /* check Barnes-Hut opening criterion */
02678             {
02679               if(nop->len * nop->len > r2 * All.ErrTolTheta * All.ErrTolTheta)
02680                 {
02681                   /* open cell */
02682                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02683                   continue;
02684                 }
02685             }
02686           else                  /* check relative opening criterion */
02687             {
02688               if(mass * nop->len * nop->len > r2 * r2 * aold)
02689                 {
02690                   /* open cell */
02691                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02692                   continue;
02693                 }
02694 
02695               if(fabs(nop->center[0] - pos_x) < 0.60 * nop->len)
02696                 {
02697                   if(fabs(nop->center[1] - pos_y) < 0.60 * nop->len)
02698                     {
02699                       if(fabs(nop->center[2] - pos_z) < 0.60 * nop->len)
02700                         {
02701                           no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02702                           continue;
02703                         }
02704                     }
02705                 }
02706             }
02707 
02708 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
02709 #ifndef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
02710           h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
02711           maxsofttype = (nop->u.d.bitflags >> 2) & 7;
02712           if(maxsofttype == 7) /* may only occur for zero mass top-level nodes */
02713             {
02714               if(mass > 0)
02715                 endrun(989);
02716               no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02717               continue;
02718             }
02719           else
02720             {
02721               if(h < All.ForceSoftening[maxsofttype])
02722                 {
02723                   h = All.ForceSoftening[maxsofttype];
02724                   if(r2 < h * h)
02725                     {
02726                       /* bit-5 signals that there are particles of
02727                        * different softening in the node
02728                        */
02729                       if(((nop->u.d.bitflags >> 5) & 1))
02730                         {
02731                           no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02732                           continue;
02733                         }
02734                     }
02735                 }
02736             }
02737 #else
02738           if(ptype == 0)
02739             h = soft;
02740           else
02741             h = All.ForceSoftening[ptype];
02742 
02743           if(h < nop->maxsoft)
02744             {
02745               h = nop->maxsoft;
02746               if(r2 < h * h)
02747                 {
02748                   no = nop->u.d.nextnode;
02749                   continue;
02750                 }
02751             }
02752 #endif
02753 #endif
02754           no = nop->u.d.sibling;        /* node can be used */
02755 
02756           if(mode == 1)
02757             {
02758               if(((nop->u.d.bitflags) & 1))     /* Bit 0 signals that this node belongs to top-level tree */
02759                 continue;
02760             }
02761         }
02762 
02763       r = sqrt(r2);
02764 
02765       tabindex = (int) (r * asmthfac);
02766 
02767       if(tabindex < NTAB)
02768         {
02769           fac = shortrange_table_potential[tabindex];
02770 
02771           if(r >= h)
02772             pot -= fac * mass / r;
02773           else
02774             {
02775 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
02776               h_inv = 1.0 / h;
02777 #endif
02778               u = r * h_inv;
02779 
02780               if(u < 0.5)
02781                 wp = -2.8 + u * u * (5.333333333333 + u * u * (6.4 * u - 9.6));
02782               else
02783                 wp =
02784                   -3.2 + 0.066666666667 / u + u * u * (10.666666666667 +
02785                                                        u * (-16.0 + u * (9.6 - 2.133333333333 * u)));
02786               pot += fac * mass * h_inv * wp;
02787             }
02788         }
02789     }
02790 
02791 
02792   /* store result at the proper place */
02793   if(mode == 0)
02794     P[target].Potential = pot;
02795   else
02796     GravDataResult[target].u.Potential = pot;
02797 }
02798 
02799 #endif
02800 
02801 
02802 
02808 void force_treeallocate(int maxnodes, int maxpart)
02809 {
02810   int i;
02811   size_t bytes;
02812   double allbytes = 0;
02813   double u;
02814 
02815   MaxNodes = maxnodes;
02816 
02817   if(!(Nodes_base = malloc(bytes = (MaxNodes + 1) * sizeof(struct NODE))))
02818     {
02819       printf("failed to allocate memory for %d tree-nodes (%g MB).\n", MaxNodes, bytes / (1024.0 * 1024.0));
02820       endrun(3);
02821     }
02822   allbytes += bytes;
02823 
02824   if(!(Extnodes_base = malloc(bytes = (MaxNodes + 1) * sizeof(struct extNODE))))
02825     {
02826       printf("failed to allocate memory for %d tree-extnodes (%g MB).\n", MaxNodes,
02827              bytes / (1024.0 * 1024.0));
02828       endrun(3);
02829     }
02830   allbytes += bytes;
02831 
02832   Nodes = Nodes_base - All.MaxPart;
02833   Extnodes = Extnodes_base - All.MaxPart;
02834 
02835   if(!(Nextnode = malloc(bytes = (maxpart + MAXTOPNODES) * sizeof(int))))
02836     {
02837       printf("Failed to allocate %d spaces for 'Nextnode' array (%g MB)\n", maxpart + MAXTOPNODES,
02838              bytes / (1024.0 * 1024.0));
02839       exit(0);
02840     }
02841   allbytes += bytes;
02842 
02843   if(!(Father = malloc(bytes = (maxpart) * sizeof(int))))
02844     {
02845       printf("Failed to allocate %d spaces for 'Father' array (%g MB)\n", maxpart, bytes / (1024.0 * 1024.0));
02846       exit(0);
02847     }
02848   allbytes += bytes;
02849 
02850   if(first_flag == 0)
02851     {
02852       first_flag = 1;
02853 
02854       if(ThisTask == 0)
02855         printf("\nAllocated %g MByte for BH-tree. %d\n\n", allbytes / (1024.0 * 1024.0),
02856                sizeof(struct NODE) + sizeof(struct extNODE));
02857 
02858       tabfac = NTAB / 3.0;
02859 
02860       for(i = 0; i < NTAB; i++)
02861         {
02862           u = 3.0 / NTAB * (i + 0.5);
02863           shortrange_table[i] = erfc(u) + 2.0 * u / sqrt(M_PI) * exp(-u * u);
02864           shortrange_table_potential[i] = erfc(u);
02865         }
02866     }
02867 }
02868 
02869 
02873 void force_treefree(void)
02874 {
02875   free(Father);
02876   free(Nextnode);
02877   free(Extnodes_base);
02878   free(Nodes_base);
02879 }

02883 
02889 #ifdef FORCETEST
02890 int force_treeevaluate_direct(int target, int mode)
02891 {
02892   double epsilon;
02893   double h, h_inv, dx, dy, dz, r, r2, u, r_inv, fac;
02894   int i, ptype;
02895   double pos_x, pos_y, pos_z;
02896   double acc_x, acc_y, acc_z;
02897 
02898 #ifdef PERIODIC
02899   double fcorr[3];
02900 #endif
02901 #ifdef PERIODIC
02902   double boxsize, boxhalf;
02903 
02904   boxsize = All.BoxSize;
02905   boxhalf = 0.5 * All.BoxSize;
02906 #endif
02907 
02908   acc_x = 0;
02909   acc_y = 0;
02910   acc_z = 0;
02911 
02912   if(mode == 0)
02913     {
02914       pos_x = P[target].Pos[0];
02915       pos_y = P[target].Pos[1];
02916       pos_z = P[target].Pos[2];
02917       ptype = P[target].Type;
02918     }
02919   else
02920     {
02921       pos_x = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[0];
02922       pos_y = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[1];
02923       pos_z = GravDataGet[target].u.Pos[2];
02924 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
02925       ptype = GravDataGet[target].Type;
02926 #else
02927       ptype = P[0].Type;
02928 #endif
02929     }
02930 
02931   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
02932     {
02933       epsilon = dmax(All.ForceSoftening[P[i].Type], All.ForceSoftening[ptype]);
02934 
02935       h = epsilon;
02936       h_inv = 1 / h;
02937 
02938       dx = P[i].Pos[0] - pos_x;
02939       dy = P[i].Pos[1] - pos_y;
02940       dz = P[i].Pos[2] - pos_z;
02941 
02942 #ifdef PERIODIC
02943       while(dx > boxhalf)
02944         dx -= boxsize;
02945       while(dy > boxhalf)
02946         dy -= boxsize;
02947       while(dz > boxhalf)
02948         dz -= boxsize;
02949       while(dx < -boxhalf)
02950         dx += boxsize;
02951       while(dy < -boxhalf)
02952         dy += boxsize;
02953       while(dz < -boxhalf)
02954         dz += boxsize;
02955 #endif
02956       r2 = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
02957 
02958       r = sqrt(r2);
02959 
02960       u = r * h_inv;
02961 
02962       if(u >= 1)
02963         {
02964           r_inv = 1 / r;
02965 
02966           fac = P[i].Mass * r_inv * r_inv * r_inv;
02967         }
02968       else
02969         {
02970           if(u < 0.5)
02971             fac = P[i].Mass * h_inv * h_inv * h_inv * (10.666666666667 + u * u * (32.0 * u - 38.4));
02972           else
02973             fac =
02974               P[i].Mass * h_inv * h_inv * h_inv * (21.333333333333 -
02975                                                    48.0 * u + 38.4 * u * u -
02976                                                    10.666666666667 * u * u *
02977                                                    u - 0.066666666667 / (u * u * u));
02978         }
02979 
02980       acc_x += dx * fac;
02981       acc_y += dy * fac;
02982       acc_z += dz * fac;
02983 
02984 #ifdef PERIODIC
02985       if(u > 1.0e-5)
02986         {
02987           ewald_corr(dx, dy, dz, fcorr);
02988 
02989           acc_x += P[i].Mass * fcorr[0];
02990           acc_y += P[i].Mass * fcorr[1];
02991           acc_z += P[i].Mass * fcorr[2];
02992         }
02993 #endif
02994     }
02995 
02996 
02997   if(mode == 0)
02998     {
02999       P[target].GravAccelDirect[0] = acc_x;
03000       P[target].GravAccelDirect[1] = acc_y;
03001       P[target].GravAccelDirect[2] = acc_z;
03002     }
03003   else
03004     {
03005       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[0] = acc_x;
03006       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[1] = acc_y;
03007       GravDataResult[target].u.Acc[2] = acc_z;
03008     }
03009 
03010 
03011   return NumPart;
03012 }
03013 #endif
03014

03021 void dump_particles(void)
03022 {
03023   FILE *fd;
03024   char buffer[200];
03025   int i;
03026 
03027   sprintf(buffer, "particles%d.dat", ThisTask);
03028   fd = fopen(buffer, "w");
03029   my_fwrite(&NumPart, 1, sizeof(int), fd);
03030 
03031   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
03032     my_fwrite(&P[i].Pos[0], 3, sizeof(FLOAT), fd);
03033 
03034   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
03035     my_fwrite(&P[i].Vel[0], 3, sizeof(FLOAT), fd);
03036 
03037   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
03038     my_fwrite(&P[i].ID, 1, sizeof(int), fd);
03039 
03040   fclose(fd);
03041 }
