03045 #ifdef PERIODIC
03046 
03060 void ewald_init(void)
03061 {
03062   int i, j, k, beg, len, size, n, task, count;
03063   double x[3], force[3];
03064   char buf[200];
03065   FILE *fd;
03066 
03067   if(ThisTask == 0)
03068     {
03069       printf("initialize Ewald correction...\n");
03070       fflush(stdout);
03071     }
03072 
03073 #ifdef DOUBLEPRECISION
03074   sprintf(buf, "ewald_spc_table_%d_dbl.dat", EN);
03075 #else
03076   sprintf(buf, "ewald_spc_table_%d.dat", EN);
03077 #endif
03078 
03079   if((fd = fopen(buf, "r")))
03080     {
03081       if(ThisTask == 0)
03082         {
03083           printf("\nreading Ewald tables from file `%s'\n", buf);
03084           fflush(stdout);
03085         }
03086 
03087       my_fread(&fcorrx[0][0][0], sizeof(FLOAT), (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) * (EN + 1), fd);
03088       my_fread(&fcorry[0][0][0], sizeof(FLOAT), (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) * (EN + 1), fd);
03089       my_fread(&fcorrz[0][0][0], sizeof(FLOAT), (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) * (EN + 1), fd);
03090       my_fread(&potcorr[0][0][0], sizeof(FLOAT), (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) * (EN + 1), fd);
03091       fclose(fd);
03092     }
03093   else
03094     {
03095       if(ThisTask == 0)
03096         {
03097           printf("\nNo Ewald tables in file `%s' found.\nRecomputing them...\n", buf);
03098           fflush(stdout);
03099         }
03100 
03101       /* ok, let's recompute things. Actually, we do that in parallel. */
03102 
03103       size = (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) / NTask;
03104 
03105 
03106       beg = ThisTask * size;
03107       len = size;
03108       if(ThisTask == (NTask - 1))
03109         len = (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) - beg;
03110 
03111       for(i = 0, count = 0; i <= EN; i++)
03112         for(j = 0; j <= EN; j++)
03113           for(k = 0; k <= EN; k++)
03114             {
03115               n = (i * (EN + 1) + j) * (EN + 1) + k;
03116               if(n >= beg && n < (beg + len))
03117                 {
03118                   if(ThisTask == 0)
03119                     {
03120                       if((count % (len / 20)) == 0)
03121                         {
03122                           printf("%4.1f percent done\n", count / (len / 100.0));
03123                           fflush(stdout);
03124                         }
03125                     }
03126 
03127                   x[0] = 0.5 * ((double) i) / EN;
03128                   x[1] = 0.5 * ((double) j) / EN;
03129                   x[2] = 0.5 * ((double) k) / EN;
03130 
03131                   ewald_force(i, j, k, x, force);
03132 
03133                   fcorrx[i][j][k] = force[0];
03134                   fcorry[i][j][k] = force[1];
03135                   fcorrz[i][j][k] = force[2];
03136 
03137                   if(i + j + k == 0)
03138                     potcorr[i][j][k] = 2.8372975;
03139                   else
03140                     potcorr[i][j][k] = ewald_psi(x);
03141 
03142                   count++;
03143                 }
03144             }
03145 
03146       for(task = 0; task < NTask; task++)
03147         {
03148           beg = task * size;
03149           len = size;
03150           if(task == (NTask - 1))
03151             len = (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) - beg;
03152 
03153 #ifdef DOUBLEPRECISION
03154           MPI_Bcast(&fcorrx[0][0][beg], len, MPI_DOUBLE, task, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
03155           MPI_Bcast(&fcorry[0][0][beg], len, MPI_DOUBLE, task, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
03156           MPI_Bcast(&fcorrz[0][0][beg], len, MPI_DOUBLE, task, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
03157           MPI_Bcast(&potcorr[0][0][beg], len, MPI_DOUBLE, task, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
03158 #else
03159           MPI_Bcast(&fcorrx[0][0][beg], len, MPI_FLOAT, task, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
03160           MPI_Bcast(&fcorry[0][0][beg], len, MPI_FLOAT, task, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
03161           MPI_Bcast(&fcorrz[0][0][beg], len, MPI_FLOAT, task, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
03162           MPI_Bcast(&potcorr[0][0][beg], len, MPI_FLOAT, task, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
03163 #endif
03164         }
03165 
03166       if(ThisTask == 0)
03167         {
03168           printf("\nwriting Ewald tables to file `%s'\n", buf);
03169           fflush(stdout);
03170 
03171           if((fd = fopen(buf, "w")))
03172             {
03173               my_fwrite(&fcorrx[0][0][0], sizeof(FLOAT), (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) * (EN + 1), fd);
03174               my_fwrite(&fcorry[0][0][0], sizeof(FLOAT), (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) * (EN + 1), fd);
03175               my_fwrite(&fcorrz[0][0][0], sizeof(FLOAT), (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) * (EN + 1), fd);
03176               my_fwrite(&potcorr[0][0][0], sizeof(FLOAT), (EN + 1) * (EN + 1) * (EN + 1), fd);
03177               fclose(fd);
03178             }
03179         }
03180     }
03181 
03182   fac_intp = 2 * EN / All.BoxSize;
03183 
03184   for(i = 0; i <= EN; i++)
03185     for(j = 0; j <= EN; j++)
03186       for(k = 0; k <= EN; k++)
03187         {
03188           potcorr[i][j][k] /= All.BoxSize;
03189           fcorrx[i][j][k] /= All.BoxSize * All.BoxSize;
03190           fcorry[i][j][k] /= All.BoxSize * All.BoxSize;
03191           fcorrz[i][j][k] /= All.BoxSize * All.BoxSize;
03192         }
03193 
03194   if(ThisTask == 0)
03195     {
03196       printf("initialization of periodic boundaries finished.\n");
03197       fflush(stdout);
03198     }
03199 }
03200 
03201 
03208 #ifdef FORCETEST
03209 void ewald_corr(double dx, double dy, double dz, double *fper)
03210 {
03211   int signx, signy, signz;
03212   int i, j, k;
03213   double u, v, w;
03214   double f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6, f7, f8;
03215 
03216   if(dx < 0)
03217     {
03218       dx = -dx;
03219       signx = +1;
03220     }
03221   else
03222     signx = -1;
03223 
03224   if(dy < 0)
03225     {
03226       dy = -dy;
03227       signy = +1;
03228     }
03229   else
03230     signy = -1;
03231 
03232   if(dz < 0)
03233     {
03234       dz = -dz;
03235       signz = +1;
03236     }
03237   else
03238     signz = -1;
03239 
03240   u = dx * fac_intp;
03241   i = (int) u;
03242   if(i >= EN)
03243     i = EN - 1;
03244   u -= i;
03245   v = dy * fac_intp;
03246   j = (int) v;
03247   if(j >= EN)
03248     j = EN - 1;
03249   v -= j;
03250   w = dz * fac_intp;
03251   k = (int) w;
03252   if(k >= EN)
03253     k = EN - 1;
03254   w -= k;
03255 
03256   f1 = (1 - u) * (1 - v) * (1 - w);
03257   f2 = (1 - u) * (1 - v) * (w);
03258   f3 = (1 - u) * (v) * (1 - w);
03259   f4 = (1 - u) * (v) * (w);
03260   f5 = (u) * (1 - v) * (1 - w);
03261   f6 = (u) * (1 - v) * (w);
03262   f7 = (u) * (v) * (1 - w);
03263   f8 = (u) * (v) * (w);
03264 
03265   fper[0] = signx * (fcorrx[i][j][k] * f1 +
03266                      fcorrx[i][j][k + 1] * f2 +
03267                      fcorrx[i][j + 1][k] * f3 +
03268                      fcorrx[i][j + 1][k + 1] * f4 +
03269                      fcorrx[i + 1][j][k] * f5 +
03270                      fcorrx[i + 1][j][k + 1] * f6 +
03271                      fcorrx[i + 1][j + 1][k] * f7 + fcorrx[i + 1][j + 1][k + 1] * f8);
03272 
03273   fper[1] = signy * (fcorry[i][j][k] * f1 +
03274                      fcorry[i][j][k + 1] * f2 +
03275                      fcorry[i][j + 1][k] * f3 +
03276                      fcorry[i][j + 1][k + 1] * f4 +
03277                      fcorry[i + 1][j][k] * f5 +
03278                      fcorry[i + 1][j][k + 1] * f6 +
03279                      fcorry[i + 1][j + 1][k] * f7 + fcorry[i + 1][j + 1][k + 1] * f8);
03280 
03281   fper[2] = signz * (fcorrz[i][j][k] * f1 +
03282                      fcorrz[i][j][k + 1] * f2 +
03283                      fcorrz[i][j + 1][k] * f3 +
03284                      fcorrz[i][j + 1][k + 1] * f4 +
03285                      fcorrz[i + 1][j][k] * f5 +
03286                      fcorrz[i + 1][j][k + 1] * f6 +
03287                      fcorrz[i + 1][j + 1][k] * f7 + fcorrz[i + 1][j + 1][k + 1] * f8);
03288 }
03289 #endif
03290 
03291 
03298 double ewald_pot_corr(double dx, double dy, double dz)
03299 {
03300   int i, j, k;
03301   double u, v, w;
03302   double f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6, f7, f8;
03303 
03304   if(dx < 0)
03305     dx = -dx;
03306 
03307   if(dy < 0)
03308     dy = -dy;
03309 
03310   if(dz < 0)
03311     dz = -dz;
03312 
03313   u = dx * fac_intp;
03314   i = (int) u;
03315   if(i >= EN)
03316     i = EN - 1;
03317   u -= i;
03318   v = dy * fac_intp;
03319   j = (int) v;
03320   if(j >= EN)
03321     j = EN - 1;
03322   v -= j;
03323   w = dz * fac_intp;
03324   k = (int) w;
03325   if(k >= EN)
03326     k = EN - 1;
03327   w -= k;
03328 
03329   f1 = (1 - u) * (1 - v) * (1 - w);
03330   f2 = (1 - u) * (1 - v) * (w);
03331   f3 = (1 - u) * (v) * (1 - w);
03332   f4 = (1 - u) * (v) * (w);
03333   f5 = (u) * (1 - v) * (1 - w);
03334   f6 = (u) * (1 - v) * (w);
03335   f7 = (u) * (v) * (1 - w);
03336   f8 = (u) * (v) * (w);
03337 
03338   return potcorr[i][j][k] * f1 +
03339     potcorr[i][j][k + 1] * f2 +
03340     potcorr[i][j + 1][k] * f3 +
03341     potcorr[i][j + 1][k + 1] * f4 +
03342     potcorr[i + 1][j][k] * f5 +
03343     potcorr[i + 1][j][k + 1] * f6 + potcorr[i + 1][j + 1][k] * f7 + potcorr[i + 1][j + 1][k + 1] * f8;
03344 }
03345 
03346 
03347 
03351 double ewald_psi(double x[3])
03352 {
03353   double alpha, psi;
03354   double r, sum1, sum2, hdotx;
03355   double dx[3];
03356   int i, n[3], h[3], h2;
03357 
03358   alpha = 2.0;
03359 
03360   for(n[0] = -4, sum1 = 0; n[0] <= 4; n[0]++)
03361     for(n[1] = -4; n[1] <= 4; n[1]++)
03362       for(n[2] = -4; n[2] <= 4; n[2]++)
03363         {
03364           for(i = 0; i < 3; i++)
03365             dx[i] = x[i] - n[i];
03366 
03367           r = sqrt(dx[0] * dx[0] + dx[1] * dx[1] + dx[2] * dx[2]);
03368           sum1 += erfc(alpha * r) / r;
03369         }
03370 
03371   for(h[0] = -4, sum2 = 0; h[0] <= 4; h[0]++)
03372     for(h[1] = -4; h[1] <= 4; h[1]++)
03373       for(h[2] = -4; h[2] <= 4; h[2]++)
03374         {
03375           hdotx = x[0] * h[0] + x[1] * h[1] + x[2] * h[2];
03376           h2 = h[0] * h[0] + h[1] * h[1] + h[2] * h[2];
03377           if(h2 > 0)
03378             sum2 += 1 / (M_PI * h2) * exp(-M_PI * M_PI * h2 / (alpha * alpha)) * cos(2 * M_PI * hdotx);
03379         }
03380 
03381   r = sqrt(x[0] * x[0] + x[1] * x[1] + x[2] * x[2]);
03382 
03383   psi = M_PI / (alpha * alpha) - sum1 - sum2 + 1 / r;
03384 
03385   return psi;
03386 }
03387 
03388 
03392 void ewald_force(int iii, int jjj, int kkk, double x[3], double force[3])
03393 {
03394   double alpha, r2;
03395   double r, val, hdotx, dx[3];
03396   int i, h[3], n[3], h2;
03397 
03398   alpha = 2.0;
03399 
03400   for(i = 0; i < 3; i++)
03401     force[i] = 0;
03402 
03403   if(iii == 0 && jjj == 0 && kkk == 0)
03404     return;
03405 
03406   r2 = x[0] * x[0] + x[1] * x[1] + x[2] * x[2];
03407 
03408   for(i = 0; i < 3; i++)
03409     force[i] += x[i] / (r2 * sqrt(r2));
03410 
03411   for(n[0] = -4; n[0] <= 4; n[0]++)
03412     for(n[1] = -4; n[1] <= 4; n[1]++)
03413       for(n[2] = -4; n[2] <= 4; n[2]++)
03414         {
03415           for(i = 0; i < 3; i++)
03416             dx[i] = x[i] - n[i];
03417 
03418           r = sqrt(dx[0] * dx[0] + dx[1] * dx[1] + dx[2] * dx[2]);
03419 
03420           val = erfc(alpha * r) + 2 * alpha * r / sqrt(M_PI) * exp(-alpha * alpha * r * r);
03421 
03422           for(i = 0; i < 3; i++)
03423             force[i] -= dx[i] / (r * r * r) * val;
03424         }
03425 
03426   for(h[0] = -4; h[0] <= 4; h[0]++)
03427     for(h[1] = -4; h[1] <= 4; h[1]++)
03428       for(h[2] = -4; h[2] <= 4; h[2]++)
03429         {
03430           hdotx = x[0] * h[0] + x[1] * h[1] + x[2] * h[2];
03431           h2 = h[0] * h[0] + h[1] * h[1] + h[2] * h[2];
03432 
03433           if(h2 > 0)
03434             {
03435               val = 2.0 / ((double) h2) * exp(-M_PI * M_PI * h2 / (alpha * alpha)) * sin(2 * M_PI * hdotx);
03436 
03437               for(i = 0; i < 3; i++)
03438                 force[i] -= h[i] * val;
03439             }
03440         }
03441 }
03442 
03443 #endif
